mapper.update:
update receivetarget_checkin
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
roomNumber = #{roomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registerTime = #{registerTime,jdbcType=DATE},
rentOutTypeID = #{rentOutTypeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passengerTypeID = #{passengerTypeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stayNumber = #{stayNumber,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
billUnitID = #{billUnitID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
depositPayWayID = #{depositPayWayID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
changingRoomNumber = #{changingRoomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
changRoomMoney = #{changRoomMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
changRoomTime = #{changRoomTime,jdbcType=DATE},
sumConst = #{sumConst,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
isBillID = #{isBillID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payTime = #{payTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where receivetargetCheckInId = #{receivetargetCheckInId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update receivetarget_checkin set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, roomNumber = #{roomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registerTime = #{registerTime,jdbcType=DATE}, rentOutTypeID = #{rentOutTypeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passengerTypeID = #{passengerTypeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stayNumber = #{stayNumber,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, billUnitID = #{billUnitID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, depositPayWayID = #{depositPayWayID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, changingRoomNumber = #{changingRoomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, changRoomMoney = #{changRoomMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, changRoomTime = #{changRoomTime,jdbcType=DATE}, sumConst = #{sumConst,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, isBillID = #{isBillID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payTime = #{payTime,jdbcType=DATE} where receivetargetCheckInId = #{receivetargetCheckInId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from receivetarget_checkin as temp inner join (select attributeDetailsName as rentOutTypeName,far_id from attributevalue) as tempa on temp.rentOutTypeID = tempa.far_id ) as tempb inner join (select attributeDetailsName as passengerTypeName,far_id as far_id1 from attributevalue) as tempc on tempb.passengerTypeID = tempc.far_id1 ) as tempd inner join (select attributeDetailsName as billUnitName,far_id as far_id2 from attributevalue) as tempe on tempd.billUnitID = tempe.far_id2) as tempf inner join (select attributeDetailsName as depositPayWayName,far_id as far_id3 from attributevalue) as tempg on tempf.depositPayWayID = tempg.far_id3) as temph inner join (select attributeDetailsName as isBillName,far_id as far_id4 from attributevalue) as tempi on temph.isBillID = tempi.far_id4 where temph.receivetargetCheckInId = #{receivetargetCheckInId}
